channel.title: Modules on 3rd SQD PreStudy
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on 3rd SQD PreStudy

item.title: Module 1
item.description: This module covers the role of a personal trainer, communication & relationship building, and motivation & behavior change.

item.title: Module 2
item.description: This module covers the exercise sciences including anatomy, kinesiology, biomechanics, and exercise physiology.

item.title: Module 3
item.description: This module covers the six essential nutrients, the Dietary Guidelines for Americans, the nutrition facts label, and weight management.

item.title: Module 4
item.description: This module covers preparticipation screening, health screening, postural analysis, and fitness assessments.

item.title: Module 5
item.description: This module covers physical activity & principles of exercise, cardiorespiratory programming, resistance training program design, and flexibility training.

item.title: Module 6
item.description: This module covers exercise considerations for special populations, medical conditions, injury management & emergency response, and legal considerations.
